title: Wts or wtt: T206 cy young sgc 86 tolstoi!!
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: Wts or wtt: T206 cy young sgc 86 tolstoi!!
posts.post_content: Glove shows pose. Only 3 tolstoi backs have ever been graded higher by psa, and that is all cards in the entire t206 set! Card is perfectly centered with an exceptional back. Corners are closer to 8's than 7's, and the color and image are perfect. Asking price $12,500 or consider trade for high grade t206s. Thanks, SCANS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST

Wow!

Very cool card.  Wish that I could afford it.

Best,
Scott
Steve- scans have been sent. Thanks
